bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of children with swelling below the flanks, loss of appetite, no digestion, yellow complexion, emaciation and desiccation of the hair. This is often accompanied by bone steaming, scrofula, and pervasion-illness. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 卷 31 ：『治 骨蒸勞，兩肋下有閃癖，漸上攻心，食少或不消化，腹內積聚不散，黃 瘦久困 , “To cure bone steaming with exhaustion, and sprain with aggregation - illness below the two flanks gradually rising to attack the heart. [Patients] eat little or may have no digestion. Accumulations and collections that fail to dissipate form in the abdomen. A yellow [complexion] and emaciation indicate long-term distress”.
